name: Assessment
description:
This small project is a continuation of my creative writing prompts. I was looking for a new way to deliver a prompt in a fun way that would be more engaging.

Everyone has times when they look at a blank screen or a piece of paper and cannot think of anything to write. Writing prompts can help kick start the imagination and writers can continue to be productive even on an off day.

My long-term goal is to provide a comprehensive creative writing resource.
